column2:
"Okay, let's get started! Wait, what was
the mission again? Something about
collecting something valuable?"

"And then there are all those mining facilities
down here. I wonder who could have built
them. It sure wasn't ARKS."

"What a waste, right? I mean, why would anyone
build so much only to leave it all behind?"
"Oh well, anyway. We've got a mission to focus on."

"よーし、はじめるか。
貴重物資の回収、だったか？"

"それにしても、この惑星にある
いろんな施設って、アークス以外の
誰かが作ったものなんだよな。"

"こんだけ採掘用の設備整えて
ほっぽってっちゃうってのも
もったいない話だよなー。"

"っとと、そんなのどーでもいいか。
それより任務だ、任務。"
